instruction: Please write a brief summary of the recent volatility in global carbon prices and its correlation with the price of oil.
output: Amid the ongoing uncertainties in the global macroeconomic environment, it's worth noting the recent decline of about 40% in carbon prices in the EU ETS7 due to the Russian invasion of Ukraine and subsequent international sanctions on Russia. Carbon prices fell from EUR 97 to EUR 58 during the first quarter but were able to recover in the latter half of March. Interestingly, the positive correlation between carbon and oil prices turned to -0.27 during this period.
